      • getAvailableUsersForShift

        @GET
 @Path(value="/shift/{shiftId}")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getAvailableUsersForShift(@PathParam(value="shiftId")
                                                                                                                                         int shiftId,
                                                                                                                                         @QueryParam(value="category")
                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String categoryString,
                                                                                                                                         @QueryParam(value="limitByCategory")
                                                                                                                                         boolean onlyThisCategory)
        Gets a list with available users for a shift
        Parameters:
        shiftId - ID for shift
        categoryString - Category ("ASSISTANT", "HEALTH_WORKER", "NURSE")
        onlyThisCategory - If true: Only get employees from specific category
        Returns:
        If success: Response OK If not admin: Response UNAUTHORIZED
